A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: More of a Marvel film than a Stars Wars film.  The story is messy and confusing and contains a substantial sub plot which is both useless and  detracts from what is actually interesting about the movie.\n\nUsually I think people overreact when talking about too much SJW concepts\, but this film has several moments where they felt the need to make pointed statements about capitalism and animal cruelty.  It felt very jarring to have those in honestly.
